SELECT aa.class_title,aa.class_num,aa.class_status,aa.class_regdate,aa.class_hour, aa.class_auth,cover.cover_num FROM class_info aa, ( SELECT class_num , cover_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY class_num ORDER BY cover_regdate DESC) cnt FROM class_img ) cover where cover.class_num=aa.class_num and cnt=1 and aa.ml_num=#{ml_num}
order by class_regdate desc limit 1
select class_title,class_num from class_info where ml_num=#{ml_num};

select aa.apply_regdate,aa.apply_auth,aa.date_num,aa.class_fee,aa.pay_regdate,aa.class_date,aa.class_num, bb.class_title,bb.scategory_name,bb.cover_num, ( select IFNULL(round(sum(curr_rating +ready_rating+kind_rating+time_rating)/4,1),0) class_rating from class_review group by class_num having class_num=aa.class_num ) rating from ( select a.apply_regdate,a.apply_auth,a.date_num,p.class_fee,p.pay_regdate,d.class_date,d.class_num from class_apply a, payment p,class_date d where a.ml_num=14 and a.apply_num=p.apply_num and a.date_num=d.date_num ) aa, ( select i.class_title,s.scategory_name,c.cover_num, i.class_num from class_info i,small_category s, ( SELECT class_num , cover_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY class_num ORDER BY cover_regdate DESC) cnt FROM class_img ) c where c.class_num=i.class_num and i.scategory_num=s.scategory_num and cnt=1 ) bb where aa.class_num=bb.class_num;

if.test: startDate!=null and startDate!='' and endDate!=null and endDate!=''

sql.if: and class_date between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}')+1

mapper.select:
select c.class_num, class_title, tutor_nickname, bcategory_num, bcategory_name,scategory_name, loc.sloc_num, pro_num, date_num, class_date, loc.*, cover.cover_num, class_regdate from ( select s.bcategory_num, bcategory_name, scategory_num, scategory_name from small_category s, big_category b where s.bcategory_num=b.bcategory_num
)a, class_info c , class_date cd, ( select sloc_num, sloc_name, bloc_name from small_location s, big_location b where s.bloc_num=s.bloc_num )loc, ( SELECT class_num , cover_num , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY class_num ORDER BY cover_regdate DESC) cnt FROM class_img ) cover
where a.scategory_num=c.scategory_num and cd.class_num=c.class_num and loc.sloc_num=c.sloc_num and cover.class_num=c.class_num and cd.time_cnt=1 and class_auth=2 and class_status=0
group by class_num order by class_num desc limit #{startRow},6
